title: FL-170 Declaration for Default or Uncontested Dissolution
question: I checked #4a - Default without Agreement and "There are no assets or debts to be disposed by the court"
answers: You still must serve on the opposing party a Preliminary Declaration of Disclosure and then a Declaration of PDD with the court unless the court specifically waives this.
